website_summaries.verdict: While not an heirloom piece, this is a serviceable dresser that will last quite a few years.
pros: Dresser’s color is accurate, owners report
Fairly easy assembly compared to others on our list
cons: Somewhat tall, making it tough for kids to reach top drawer
A few reports of incorrect parts on arrival, making assembly more difficult

customer_reviews.title: I love this dresser and I did not buy it for a nursery
customer_reviews.text: First of all, I’m not an expecting parent. I wanted to get this dresser to place it next to my bed based on its size and color. It’s perfect for storing delicates and houseware. The package arrived with no damage and all the pieces were wrapped really well. I’m happy to say there were no scratches or broken pieces. It took me a couple of hours to put this together on my own. I’m not the best at assembling. If you live with someone, ask for help. The wood is heavy and the materials are sturdy so I took my time to screw ever piece together. But I’m very happy with the end result.
customer_reviews.author: Haddy

customer_reviews.title: Nice Bright White Dresser
customer_reviews.text: Very nice dresser. Feels pretty sturdy for this price range. It doesn't have that "super cheap" feel that many particle board dressers have. We are using it in our nursery and chose it because the 18.5" top depth from the wall was perfect to place a changing pad on. Bright white color is exactly what we were hoping for. Assembly wasn't bad. It took me about 1.5 hours to do it alone.
customer_reviews.author: Rick

customer_reviews.title: ... purchased this dresser for my nursery and it is great. I am also using it as a changing ...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this dresser for my nursery and it is great. I am also using it as a changing table. I built it myself at 9 months pregnant (was nesting hardcore and couldn't wait for husband to come home and help) and it took about an hour and a half. I like the height for using it as a changing table and the drawer size provides good storage. Would give it 5 stars but two of the drawers don't track perfectly because some of the holes for the tracks were slightly off. The drawers still close and it doesn't really bother me but it drives my husband crazy.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Looks polished but is low quality and hard to assemble
customer_reviews.text: This dresser looks nice and has kept in good shape for almost two years with a new baby. I will say, though, it was a total hassle to put together with so many pieces and despite that fact that it looks nice it is pretty low quality furniture for the price. The matching changing table had a drawer front fall off and we had to fix it. I am giving this four stars because it does look nice and we will probably get another 2-3 years out of this piece of furniture. If this was a $99 piece of furniture it would have met all my expectations, but at twice it is a little lacking.
customer_reviews.author: J & L Mason

customer_reviews.title: Do not purchase this item if your looking for a complete functional dresser.
customer_reviews.text: Drawers pull out less than half the depth. The slides do not extend out far enough making it basically useless for storage I had to purchase Blum slides and change the original ones out, just to get full use of the unit. (Added cost) To do so, you need to modify the drawers to fit the slides and to make this happen
customer_reviews.author: Marcello

customer_reviews.title: Decent
customer_reviews.text: Dresser arrived with one side panel cracked from the top until about 1/3 of the way down. It was to much of a hassle to send it back so we positioned the dresser so you cant see the damage. Other then that its pretty decent for the money. The drawers open about half an inch on there own sometimes. Overall it serves its purpose for holding items for my 3 month old. I don't think it will be around long enough for it to be used with the toddler bed if it is I'll be surprised and we are very gentle with it now.
customer_reviews.author: eweeks9

customer_reviews.title: I'm very happy with this purchase
customer_reviews.text: I'm very happy with this purchase. I was nervous ordering online that the quality would not be great or the dresser would be too small but it's perfect. Nice, solid wood and the color is beautiful (espresso). We purchased this for my 2 1/2 year old and I think he'll be able to use it for years to come. It took my husband about an hour and a half to put together.
customer_reviews.author: Christina D

customer_reviews.title: Great dresser, easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: After assembling a lot of other kids furniture I was impressed by the clear directions, quality and simplicity of assembling this dresser. The parts were clearly labeled, assembly was partially done (dowels inserted, etc.). There was a small issue with the screws on the track not going in tightly enough so it catches when the drawer opens and closes, but I think that is user error. Overall very impressed with the durability, ease of assembly, overall look and quality of this product.
customer_reviews.author: LSW10

customer_reviews.title: Easy to put together and packed great
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this as a dresser and changing table for my little girl's nursery. It was easy to put together (my husband did it in less than an hour) and it looks wonderful. I ordered it to be delivered by DHL all the way to Indonesia and it arrived wonderfully packed and there was not a scratch on it. I plan on putting a changing pad on it and using it for my daughter's room for quite a while. Definitely recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Maureen Ienuso

customer_reviews.title: this product is sturdy. i put care into putting it together and ...
customer_reviews.text: this product is sturdy. i put care into putting it together and i imagine it will last a really long time. the casters for the drawers run nice and smooth. the white finish looks great. it's a bonus that it's made of sustainably grown new zealand pine.
customer_reviews.author: Max

customer_reviews.title: Not very stable
customer_reviews.text: Wife built this while I was gone. Not very stable, and the clamp to secure this to the wall is a piece of cloth that screws to the dresser and wall via an anchor. I don't feel it's very safe.
customer_reviews.author: Ravi Patel

customer_reviews.title: High quality and easy assembly
customer_reviews.text: Bought this dresser to match the DaVinci crib that we already had. Very pleased with the quality and the assembly was very straight forward with good instructions.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The perfect dresser for our baby's nursery!
customer_reviews.text: This dresser is absolutely perfect. The shipping was quick, packaging was adequate (with no damage to the parts in the box), and assembly was fairly easy. My husband and I put it together in about 40 minutes and it looks gorgeous in our baby's nursery. While we haven't used it much, it seems extremely durable. We are doubling it up as a dresser and changing table. Very happy with the purchase and price-point - would definitely recommend this dresser to others!
customer_reviews.author: Briana

customer_reviews.title: Drawers don’t pull out far enough
customer_reviews.text: These drawers do not pull out more than 6 inches. It’s nearly impossible to reach the back half of the drawer. Ended up taking the entire thing apart and putting new glides on to make it usable. Other than that, the dresser is sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: This dresser is great, except that it does take a few hours ...
customer_reviews.text: This dresser is great, except that it does take a few hours to put together. The drawers are not very deep, so if you are looking for a dresser to hold a lot of clothing this is not the one for you. However, my husband and I purchased it just for the nursery, only expecting it to hold baby clothes, which is does perfectly. My only complaint is that for some reason one of the drawers does not close as easily as the others and we can't figure out why as everything was put together exactly as the directions say. I still think this is a great dresser for a great price; VERY STURDY!
customer_reviews.author: Kbarnes

customer_reviews.title: Good dresser for the price.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this dresser for a nursery. The box looked like it had been through a war, but only one minor defect on the dresser. The white is pure white, not off-white. It came in many, many pieces.
customer_reviews.author: pandora1

customer_reviews.title: No instructions and cosmetic defects.
customer_reviews.text: Did not come with any instructions, very disappointing. Also came with several cosmetic defects.
customer_reviews.author: Kayla

customer_reviews.title: Works as both a dresser and a changing table
customer_reviews.text: We bought this hoping to use it as both a dresser and a changing table. It fits the changing pad with a little length to spare, which is perfect! The color is lovely, and it's pretty sturdy. Definitely a great purchase that my husband and I are very pleased with!
customer_reviews.author: SJ Bocci

customer_reviews.title: Hope you know what you’re doing
customer_reviews.text: Looks nice and seems pretty sturdy so far, but the assembly directions are terrible.
customer_reviews.author: P Louis

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful piece!!
customer_reviews.text: I receive my order late but.it was carrier fault(dislike ups) it arrived well packaged. Took me a couple of.hours to assemble but it was worth it. Looks beautiful! Love the color and the quality of the whole piece including drawers. Gave a nice look to my bedroom. Would recommend to everyone
customer_reviews.author: Karina I.

customer_reviews.title: Very good dresser at great price!
customer_reviews.text: This is a very well-made dresser at a reasonable price. I bought one two years ago from a different website for my older daughter, and was so happy to find it recently on Amazon to buy another for my younger daughter. I love the way the drawers glide so smoothly, and they stop before being able to be pulled out completely. Assembly took a couple hours, but was not too bad. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Renee B

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Finish is lighter than the photo shows. I was surprised by the color but it is still beautiful in my son's nursery.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Beasley

customer_reviews.title: Davinci Jayden Bedroom Items Are Good to Go!
customer_reviews.text: These Davinci Jayden bedroom pieces are great. The finish is very nice, and the assembly was a breeze with one extra person helping only a little bit. The drawers are solid and sturdy and we've been impressed so far. We'll see how well the hold up to baby when she comes! :) Overall, a great purchase at a comparable price point with other similar items. Very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Nate H

customer_reviews.title: Nursery Dresser/changing table
customer_reviews.text: Pretty easy for my husband and I to assemble. Was worried at first since box it came it was very damaged, but pieces inside were fine. All pieces were clearly labeled too.
customer_reviews.author: amanda

customer_reviews.title: Top Quality Dresser
customer_reviews.text: This dresser comes in a huge box and must be assembled piece by piece which took longer than expected. Once the dresser was assembled it looked great in the nursery! Made of top quality materials. I only gave it four stars because of the assembly time. Highly recommend this dresser.
customer_reviews.author: Regina

customer_reviews.title: Nice dresser
customer_reviews.text: The DaVinci Roxanne 4-Drawer Dresser (Espresso) was very easy to put together. Arrived in great shape. It has a nice true espresso color. The only con so far is its a little on the small side. But overall, worth the price and seems like a quality product. It did have a little smell/odor but after airing the room out it was gone.
customer_reviews.author: Texas

customer_reviews.title: Great dresser
customer_reviews.text: I loved this dresser so much that 4 years later when I had my second daughter she got one too. And my first borns is still in great condition. Love this dresser.
customer_reviews.author: Kaleigh

customer_reviews.title: nice looking, but scratches easily
customer_reviews.text: the piece is nice looking, i like the color, it looks the same in person as it does in the picture, but it scratches easily. My husband put it together, so I really don't know how hard it was, but he didn't have any complaints about it.
customer_reviews.author: Gina

customer_reviews.title: Nice.  Use wood glue to make sturdier.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for the $. Fit perfectly. I had help putting it together and used wood glue
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful dresser! Bought it for my 10 year old
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful dresser! Bought it for my 10 year old, and just substituted the knobs with more elegant ones, and it worked out great. The assembly was time consuming, but all the pieces fit together like a glove
customer_reviews.author: VSEB

customer_reviews.title: Terrible Quality
customer_reviews.text: Only a few months after purchasing, the dresser started falling apart. The bottom drawer can't have anything in it besides a few feather weight items because the bottom falls out. The top drawer's front facing panel has fallen out several times. I have Ikea pieces that are better quality and we paid less. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Looks nice
customer_reviews.text: Looks nice, easy to put together-- but the drawers do not sit properly.
customer_reviews.author: N. Andreassen

customer_reviews.title: Great quality build
customer_reviews.text: Took about 1.5 hour for two of us to put together. Great quality build.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon shopper 85

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful White Dresser
customer_reviews.text: Perfect simple sturdy white dresser. A bit taller than I thought - but not a problem at all! Not too difficult to put together. Not cheap looking. Wanted pottery barn - but their furniture is highly priced. This is similar in style, and not cheap looking. Great deal for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Gapeach

customer_reviews.title: great dresser
customer_reviews.text: perfect for a changing table dresser combo ! will need to get something little bigger later on
customer_reviews.author: Irene

customer_reviews.title: Worth the Price
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product for the price. Is it fine furniture? No. But it is solid, well constructed, and easy to assemble. And, it looks pretty good. I would buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: TheMarv

customer_reviews.title: It's nice but the drawers don't fit in very snuggly
customer_reviews.text: It's nice but the drawers don't fit in very snuggly. It's not enough to keep you from buying this, I would still pick it again over others
customer_reviews.author: K.B.

customer_reviews.title: Good deal
customer_reviews.text: Good deal for the price. Not super sturdy, no anchors included. Very pretty.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Young

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product - just what I wanted
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice chest. It took some work to assemble it, but I expected that given the number of drawers. All the parts were there and the instructions were pretty straight forward. It is solid and the drawers work fine.
customer_reviews.author: karenS

customer_reviews.title: Very nice dresser - Plan ahead!
customer_reviews.text: We ordered this dresser for our baby's nursery. Luckily, he isn't due for a few months. One of the drawer pieces is defective and we'll need to request a replacement from the company. We went through this with the crib too (same company). The good news is that the company is very responsive and ships the replacement piece pretty quickly (and at no additional cost). Plan on 10 - 14 days. We are very pleased with the furniture and the savings. But, we're glad that we have plenty of time given the issues with broken or defective parts!
customer_reviews.author: SPSCO

customer_reviews.title: Really nice basic dresser
customer_reviews.text: This dresser is really nice! The packaging was the best I’ve ever seen! I would definitely recommended this brand to other people and would order again!
customer_reviews.author: Debbie Leone

customer_reviews.title: Very nice dresser
customer_reviews.text: Very nice dresser for the price. Would like a little more solid drawer bottoms and cab back (cardboard type material), but over very happy with the look, finish and hardware.
customer_reviews.author: Ted L

customer_reviews.title: My husband had to fix the misaligned holes. Nothing ...
customer_reviews.text: My husband had to fix the misaligned holes. Nothing lined up, drawers were skewed. I would have sent it back, but he worked on it when I wasn't home-- and the box was torn apart!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Did a lot of shopping around for a baby furniture set. Ordered this for the value and design. Was a little hesitant to order unassembled furniture through Amazon, but I'll tell you they exceeded my expectations. Not only was the furniture well packed for shipping...... I was really impressed by the real wood quality and ease of assembly! I ordered the crib, dresser and changing table to make the set. This is defiantly higher quality furniture and with my help, very well put together;)
customer_reviews.author: A

customer_reviews.title: Great dresser
customer_reviews.text: This dresser is the perfect size for a nursery. It is very nice looking for the money too. Really easy to put together.
customer_reviews.author: kristin815

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, nice finish, easy assembly
customer_reviews.text: I'm very happy with this dresser. It is sturdy, has a nice finish which matches our other furniture and was very easy to put together, my wife did it by herself.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fits most of my sons clothes and is perfect for when he gets older.
customer_reviews.author: Royalle

customer_reviews.title: Great for my baby's room
customer_reviews.text: This fit my needs perfectly for my nursery. It is slightly taller than I would have liked, but I am a pretty short person. Otherwise, easy to put together with another person and very sturdy. The drawers have a good amount of room for baby clothes, but probably will run out of room for larger kids clothing.
customer_reviews.author: F Edwards

customer_reviews.title: Finished product nice but a major size error
customer_reviews.text: We found the dresser somewhat easy to assemble however one of the three pieces on the back was the wrong length (an entire inch too long) and required that we adjust before completing the project. Other than this, the dresser is holding together nicely and matched the other piece we bought (Da Vinci Richmond Crib) nicely.
customer_reviews.author: Desiree Cruise

customer_reviews.title: Dresser
customer_reviews.text: I love DaVinci products. Reasonably priced and grow with your child. So when we were expecting again naturally we went with a dresser from them and don't regret it. The only downside is it is easily scratched due to soft wood.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: easy peasy
customer_reviews.text: This was so easy to put together. Plus, it looks really nice. I bought it off Amazon because it was the cheapest. Now, it's not a $500 dresser so it's going to seem a little bit less than perfect but what do you want for a small dresser that is this inexpensive? It's perfect, fits in my son's room, and when put together works perfectly fine.
customer_reviews.author: Nat

customer_reviews.title: Not as high quality as expected
customer_reviews.text: Received package and it came with scratches, dents, and damage. Put together there are a lot of warped pieces that make the dresser not go together as well as I would expect. Holes for cam locks were drilled on wrong side of drawer assembly. Not really that big of a deal, but once again I expected more. I bought a DaVinci for the quality and instead I received something I could have bought at Walmart. Since, I procrastinated and the little one will be here in a week, we are just going to grin and bear it, just wanted to get our story out there.
customer_reviews.author: Charles

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together instructions good quality. Would recommend to a friend
customer_reviews.author: T. Simpson

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Love this dresser. Great look and quality. Easy to assemble and the drawers slide very smoothly. I would highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea T. Martin

customer_reviews.title: Great Product for Price
customer_reviews.text: For the price, this is a very solid product. This dresser is put together with screws which provides for a much sturdier product than nails. It's a beautiful dresser and one that seems will last us for years to come.
customer_reviews.author: Gina

customer_reviews.title: Davinci Jayden 4 Drawer Dresser
customer_reviews.text: Good quality for the price I paid, and looks nice and sturdy. Relatively easy to assemble. If you are looking for a good size non-fancy drawer dresser, this is an excellent choice. Very recommendable.
customer_reviews.author: M P Stanger

customer_reviews.title: Great dresser
customer_reviews.text: Great dresser and pretty sturdy! Definitely worth the price. It's being used for my newborns nursery and the espresso color looks elegant.
customer_reviews.author: Tho Ayala

customer_reviews.title: Particle Board!
customer_reviews.text: I went with DaVinci because they advertise themselves as "natural" such as sustainable New Zealand Pine, formaldehyde and lead safe etc. However, the bottom of the drawers and the back of the dresser are particle board. It doesn't add up. And, the dresser is sort of flimsy and took 5 hours to put together. For the price it is not terrible but if you are searching for a completely non-toxic nursery set (as I kind of was) the particle board doesn't fit.
customer_reviews.author: Jacqueline

customer_reviews.title: Very good quality
customer_reviews.text: Very good quality and seems like it will last a long time
customer_reviews.author: Brent

customer_reviews.title: Great all around
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this dresser with the Jayden crib and they match perfectly in my opinion. The dresser doubles as a changing table and fits standard pads. My husband and I are both average height, so the taller dresser isn't a problem with changes. If you are on the petite side, the height may pose challenges. The order arrived on time without any issues and my husband assembled with ease. Great style and value for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Daisy Owens

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: You can read my review on the tall one as I bought two of these items. I was very impressed with the price to quality ratio. Very heavy duty and easy to put together. I was very happy with this purchase for our baby room!
customer_reviews.author: Jake4$

product_meta.title: Davinci Jayden 4-Drawer Dresser, White
product_meta.description:
Complementing the Jayden 4-in-1 Crib, the equally sophisticated Jayden 4-Drawer Dresser is the perfect storage option to last a lifetime. With four spacious drawers, this dresser provides ample amounts of storage for the nursery years and beyond. New and improved with metal glide hardware, the dresser's sturdy drawers open and close smoothly. Built in stop mechanisms on the dresser allow parents to rest easy, knowing that Jayden is the safe choice.

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
Store baby's things with Roxanne convenience. With four drawers, it's the dresser you need. That's engineering for baby. That's Roxanne.
feature_bullets: DURABILITY: 4 spacious drawers that can hold all the adorable baby clothes, blanket, and more. NEW AND IMPROVED with thicker drawer bottoms to make it sturdier and long-lasting

VERSATILE DESIGN: Changing station now. Big kid dresser later! This dresser is designed so that you can add a DaVinci changing tray (#M0219) to use as a convenient changing station during the baby years

SMOOTH GLIDE: Pre-installed ball-bearing drawer glides that make opening the drawers easy even when your hands are full with baby; ROUNDED WOODEN KNOBS: This dresser features stylish, wooden knobs that are rounded to prevent injuries when your baby starts crawling and walking around

EASY ASSEMBLY: We've done the hardest part for you! Drawer glides come pre-assembled so that you can put your dresser together more quickly and start enjoying your nursery sooner; QUALITY MATERIAL: Made of solid sustainable New Zealand pinewood and TSCA compliant engineered wood -only the best for your baby

FOR YOUR BABY'S SAFETY: Say goodbye to toxic chemicals! Finished in a non-toxic multi-step painting process and lead and phthalate safe. Rest assured knowing it exceeds ASTM International and U.S. CPSC safety standards. Stop mechanism and anti-tip kit included for additional safety GreenGuard Gold Certified

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.0 out of 5 stars98 ratings4.0 out of 5 stars
